data.text: De, Jisasɨlɨn wokok guŋgundandi Kaperneam valambe ŋɨmeve Distrik Jutatɨk Jordan maŋamguan aŋgɨndaŋɨk. De, balañjun wusandaŋɨn yika wunutuk mfakaŋguŋove. Kape, de, wun wokok fulak kavik paveve, wun valatɨk yila wulu mfɨtɨtiwɨ sivɨleve.
De, yila Farisitɨle* autun wunutuk yiŋɨme wunu muwɨ dɨpikape kombɨiyeve, “Gotɨn Masiveve Goŋguaŋmali Fulakɨn* kavik galavala, yetɨk avɨtɨn wokok me apɨtomoñmaŋga pavale fulakɨn anafak, a?”
Jisasɨlɨn kavik galaveve, “Anañ anañ Mosesɨlɨn* ambɨkɨk anañ toneve wuŋgasutɨk gɨtɨk wulu sivɨleve?”
Valan kapendi kavik galaveve, “Mosesɨlɨn galaveve yetɨk avɨtɨn wokok me apɨtomoñmaŋga pavalen katɨk avɨtɨn wokok me apɨtomoñmaŋgapale janda motve masive wokok metɨk.”
De, Jisasɨlɨn valatɨk kavik galaveve, “Ben wulu pindavale balañju, kapendi Mosesɨlɨn katɨk ŋaikɨk wulu betɨk motve masiveve.
Kape anañ anañ vaŋ Gotɨn yila wulu galaveve. Gotɨn lua wofop mandɨvevekandi, wun balañju mañjikatɨk gotve mandɨveve. Avɨti me mandɨveve, wun.
Gotɨn kavik paveve, kapekandi wun ambatɨk kasik fulak masiveve. De, yetɨk avɨtɨn wokok waŋdi wome valambakandi wokok me yivpa.
Yivakandi valan alawiñɨñ ŋaikɨk safu tonapa. Valan alawiñɨñ gaveka. Kayi. Ŋaikɨk balañjɨkɨŋgo tonapa.
Kape, de, Gotɨn anañ mfakuŋove balañju, yetɨk balañjɨkɨn apɨtomoñmandu.”
De, Jisasɨndi wokok guŋgundan mfotok ŋɨmevendi wokok guŋgundan katɨk wun anañ sivɨtvale me apɨtomoñmale wulu yika kombɨiyeve.
Kapendi wun valatɨk galaveve, “Yetɨk avɨtɨn wokok me apɨtomoñme yetɨk me yivalen, wun mendulak fulak pava. Wun wunutuk yakai yakai pava.
Miyakavik yetɨk melɨn wokok malat apɨtomoñme yetɨk malat yivalen, wun miyakavik mendulak fulak pava.”
De, yila balañjun faklia Jisasɨtɨk malaŋmaŋga paveve, wun vala mfovaŋga. Kape wokok guŋgundan vala apɨkakambe galaveve.
Jisasɨlɨn kavik wulevekandi gɨlipe valatɨk kavik sivɨleve, “Faklia ŋunutuk ga yiŋɨme. Apɨkakambe sivɨtvandu. Gotkɨk lomɨle balañjun kavik tonmale balañju.
Ŋɨn wulu vaŋu betɨk sivɨtva, yetɨk balañjɨkɨn Got lolom tonmaŋga sa fakliakiŋgo ka vavalawalen wun Gotkɨk watɨk avik lovapa? Kayi vaŋ.”
Kape, de, Jisasɨlɨn kavɨla faklia mamatawuwo kɨlia valatɨk mandɨve kukuñeve, Gotɨn valatɨk wulu anafu ga pavaŋga.
De, Jisasɨlɨn yetɨk mɨtɨk ŋɨmevekatɨk yetɨk avɨtɨn wunutuk jaŋmɨ yiŋɨmevekandi vandamfufu mañjikatɨk mandɨvevekandi kombɨiyeve, “Watpalaŋ Anafawali. Ŋɨn avik pave Gotki tonŋɨmama siŋambamavi?”
Jisasɨlɨn wunutuk kavik sivɨleve, “Dɨn ŋunutuk aipandi anafawali galava. Got ŋaikɨkɨn tonma anafawali.

Dɨn aipandi kombɨiya? Dɨn Gotɨn Masiveve Goŋguaŋmali Fulak* juŋava, ‘Balañjɨk mat mat gaŋga sɨŋgɨnmandu. Mendulak Pavandu. Yetɨk balañjɨkɨk we fombandu. Balañjɨkɨk safutuk muwale wulu mandɨve sivɨtvandu. Muwɨ apɨpɨlaive yivandu, yetɨk balañjɨkɨk we. Waŋdi wome waiŋgeve fofonombe.’ ”
De, katɨk avɨtɨn Jisasɨtɨk sivɨleve, “Watpalaŋ, ŋɨn sawekatɨk mandɨvɨli miyakavik kavɨla wulu ŋaikɨk juŋave paŋɨlali.”

Jisasɨlɨn wunu wulevekandi towok mɨlikevekandi kavik sivɨleve, “Dɨn yetɨk ŋaikɨk fulak ava pave. Dɨn dakɨk lua yila balañjutuk ga wusuwɨ. Yivale moni miña balañjutuk yataŋgɨn masive. Kavik pavakandi dɨn lua wusandaŋ Hevenɨk tonapa. Kape, ŋɨme. Ŋunu vañjenme ŋɨme.”
Katɨk maŋgɨk bɨiyevekandi baŋgaivɨkɨ ŋɨmeve. Wokok lua gasakamanaŋ toneve.
De, Jisasɨlɨn wokok guŋgundatɨk wutve sivɨleve, “Lua wusandaŋ tonmale balañjun Got lolomɨk tonmaŋga ta mandɨmbɨi mandɨmbɨiapati.”
Wokok guŋgundan wokok wulu bɨiyevekandi bɨkɨk kumbaŋgin kambekeve. Kape Jisasɨlɨn yika sivɨleve, “Wufakali. Balañjun Gotkɨk lolomɨk tonmaŋga ta mandɨmbɨi mandɨmbɨiapati.

Gaŋgɨikɨk fopɨle guanɨk kameltɨn love salavakalen ka balakaŋgale. Miyakavik lua wusandaŋ tonmale yetɨk balañjɨkɨn Gotkɨk watɨk avik lovapa. Kape katɨk lua towok tonmale balañjɨkɨn Gotkɨk watɨk ta lovale wulun kameltɨn gaŋgɨikɨk fopɨle guanɨk love salavale wulu matɨkakalɨwa.” Kamel galavale jakali kavik tonma
Wokok guŋgundan kavik bɨiye towok pɨkɨliye kombɨiyeve Jisasɨtɨk, “Miyakavik tonmalen, nan Gotki tonŋɨmama siŋambamavi?”
Jisasɨlɨn vala wutve sivɨleve, “Balañjun avik? Kape Gotɨn balakapa. Wun pava wulu wulu wofop.”
De, Pitalɨn wunutuk galaveve, “Wutve, ñen lua wofop valambevekandi vañjenma, du.”

De, Jisasɨlɨn sivɨleve, “Ŋɨn wulu vaŋu betɨk sivɨtva, yetɨk balañjɨkɨn ŋunu vañjenme mɨliwakandi wokok mfoti wuŋgiaki wuiñaŋdi wufakandi avɨti samindi waŋdi womendi mañjikandi faklia valambalen ŋunundi Gotkɨk wulu anafu vañjenmaŋga,
wun kamfu watɨk tonmale vandi 100 mfutundi wufakalindi samilundi womeandundi fakliandi mañjika yivapa. Kape yila balañjun yaka wulu wunutuk papa. Kape wun pɨndaŋ siŋambamavi tonŋɨmama Gotki.
Kape yila wusandaŋ kamfu gasak tonmale balañju Gotɨn malaŋbumbapa. Kape yila wusandaŋ wuŋa miyakɨk tonmale balañju Gotɨn malaŋkɨvapa.”

De, Jisasɨlɨn wokok guŋgundandi yila balañjundi Jerusalemɨk masi ŋɨmeve. Jisasɨlɨn wandefop ŋɨmeve. Valan pɨndaŋɨle balañjun veven juŋavevekandi valaiyeve. Mai kamfu ŋɨmevekandi Jisasɨlɨn wokok guŋgunda yive sivɨlɨmeve wunutuk pɨndaŋ pavaŋgapale papawa.

Wun kavik sivɨleve, “Bɨiye. Amban Jerusalemɨk ŋɨma. Yetɨk balañjɨkɨn Balañjɨkɨk Fak* kɨndɨŋmɨ suwapa Gasak Wamɨle Gasak Wakundundi* Gotkɨk Wulu Kumbaŋgikɨk Balañjutuk*. Valan wunu ga sɨŋgɨnmaŋgapale wulu sivɨtve tɨmbapa. Kapekandi wunu masivapa wutatɨk.
Kavɨla wutan wunu maiyawakandi susupi tulakandi towok paiyakandi matve ga sɨŋgɨnapa. Matve ga sɨŋgɨnmindi wun alilaŋgɨk vandi yika kambekapa.”
Sepatikɨk fun, Jemsɨndi Jon, valan Jisasɨtɨk ŋɨme kombɨiyeve, “Watpalaŋ, ñen kombɨiyale wulu dɨn pavaŋga mɨliwa.”
Jisasɨlɨn valatɨk sivɨleve, “Ben ŋɨn gɨtɨk we pavaŋga mɨliwa?”
Valan sivɨleve, “Dɨn gasak tonmakandi ñetɨle yetɨk mamataŋ ga yisɨwɨ, yetɨk aŋgataŋ ga yisɨwɨ.”
De, Jisasɨlɨn valatɨk sivɨleve. “Ben kombɨiyale wulu ben waiŋgeve ka juŋavi. Ben waiŋgeve jivapala kasik ŋɨn jivapale wombikasak? Katɨk ŋɨn maŋamɨk bumbale we ben wakan kavik bumbapala?”
Valan galaveve, “Ñen balawa.”
Kape mamataŋdi aŋgataŋɨk yisɨwaŋgapale wulu ŋakɨk wulu gaveka. Kavɨla tɨkɨmu Gotɨn galavale balañjukok.”
Kavɨla yila fopat guŋgundan kavɨla wulu bɨiyevekandi bɨkɨk kumbaŋgin yakakale, Jemsɨndi Jontok.

Kape Jisasɨlɨn vala ga yiŋɨmevekandi galaveve, “Ben juŋava, wutan yila balañju gasak wakɨn galava. Kavɨla wutatɨle gasak wakundun bɨkɨk lolomɨk tonmale balañju bɨkɨk wulu ga bɨiye pave. Bɨkɨk gasak autun bɨkɨk juñjuŋama sivɨtva yila balañju ga pavaŋga.
Kape ben kavik tonmandu. Gasak balañjɨk tonmaŋgapale betɨle balañjɨkɨn bikɨk luasamban tonme.
Betɨle yetɨkɨn wakɨn tonmaŋga mɨliwalen, wun sambanma vaŋ tonme.
Miyakavik Balañjɨkɨk Fakɨn ava yiŋɨme yila balañju wunu matɨkokolewaŋga. Kayi. Wun yila balañju matɨkokolewaŋga yiŋɨmeve. Wun sɨŋgɨnmaŋga yiŋɨmeve, yila balañju wusandaŋ wusuwaŋga.”

Jisasɨlɨn wokok guŋgundandi Jeriko galavale watɨkɨk ŋɨmeve. Yika valambe ŋɨmevekandi yila balañju gasakamanaŋɨn wakan ŋɨmeve. De, mai laŋgɨnɨk yisɨwɨ toneve Bartimeus galavale avɨtɨn. Wun Timeus galavale avɨtkɨk fak. Bartimeusɨlɨn yetɨk sɨpala yakakalekɨk avɨt.
Wun Nasaletɨle Jisasɨlɨn yiŋɨmeve sak bɨiyeve. Bɨiyevekandi kavik joŋ galaveve, “Jisas! Devitkɨk* Afun! Dɨn ŋunu balambanme!”
Valan wunu apɨkakambe kavik galaveve, “Dɨn maŋgɨk valambe!”
De, Jisasɨlɨn ŋɨmevekandi sambɨtve kavik galaveve, “Ga yiŋɨme.”
De, wun wokok safu tɨmbeve yetɨk wataŋ malipakɨ afɨndafɨnda pɨtɨkti kambekuakavekandi Jisasɨtɨk ŋɨmeve.
De, Jisasɨlɨn wunutuk sivɨleve, “Dɨn ŋɨn dutuk gɨtɨk pavaŋga mɨliwa?”
Jisasɨlɨn wunutuk sivɨleve, “Dɨn kavik juŋava ŋɨn pɨtɨkɨn tonma dakɨk sɨpala anafak ga tonmaŋga. Kapekandi dɨn anafak dala juŋaŋɨme.”
